modName: Erahnia - A home on the water
summary: A boat? A home? Nah... Both!
descriptionHtml:
Want to live in Solitude? But to poor too by a house? Or just never felt home on land?
Well then this is the home for you. By the docks of lovely Solitude we got Erahnia! A big boat filled for your basic needs! Has a bar for you and your companions, and if you\'re sleepy? Three beds for your friends, and one master one just for you.

============
DESCRIPTION
============

Erahnia is a player home in the docks of Solitude. It has everything a normal home should, and usually have, including kitchen, master bedroom, a small bedroom with three beds, a bar, a small armory, alchemy table and enchanting table. It\'s fully Navmeshed and should work fine with any companions you have. Has a \"ready to travel to\" map marker so no need to discover the docks. 

=============
INSTALLATION
=============

Just simply drop the \"Ship home.esp\" in your datafolder and check the box in data files in your game launcher.

======================
POSSIBLE FUTURE PLANS
======================

Might add NPC:s such as a bartender, a chef, a bard and perhaps a few sailors, of course in an optional file.
[B]UPDATE[/B]
My NPC update will take time, because CK crash when trying to review my NPC.

===============================
COMPATIBILITY & REQUIREMENTS
===============================

Should be compatible with any mod that doesn\'t alter with the same area as the boat. 

This mod does only require Skyrim base game and update.esm
Does work with Dawnguard and Hearthfire, but they are not required.

======
OTHER
======

The name Erahnia comes from my friend and ex girlfriend, who made it up or something. And you know, she kinda looks like a boat so why not use that name?

Also, this is my second mod ever made, so please don\'t be too hard on me, but constructive criticism is always welcome.

Please endorse if you like the house, it would encourage me too do more. 
Also, now I know why boat homes are rare here on the Nexus... It\'s a really enoying process doing those...

And for any grammatical errors, I\'m sorry, I\'m Swedish so english is not my native language.

Please report any problems or bugs, and I will try fix this as fast as possible.

[youtube]YgKNJS2BEKQ[/youtube]
author: Andiders
